```{r settings}
#
# H. sapiens infected with L. major settings
# Updated 2017/11/24 (cutoff: 0.40)
# Note: A very low cutoff (e.g. 0.02) would also be good for capturing more
# total TF enrichment, although the ratio of GO/CPDB enrichment to # genes is
# much lower, and would have a lot more noise.
#

#
# Manuscript-specific configuration
#
MANUSCRIPT_CONFIG <- list(
    title           = "Consensus Co-expression Network Comparison: H. sapiens infected with L. major", 
    input_dir       = file.path(Sys.getenv('SCRATCH'), 'param_opt', 'normal',
                                'hsapiens_infected_with_lmajor-v6.0'),
    output_dirname  = 'hslm-inf',
    quantile_cutoff = 0.40,
    networks        = read_csv(file.path(
                                  Sys.getenv('r15'), 
                                  '115-coex-network-param-opt-v6',
                                  'output', 'normal',
                                  'hsapiens_infected_with_lmajor-v6.0.csv'))
)

#
# Base co-expression analysis configuration
#
CONFIG <- list(
    host            = "H. sapiens",
    pathogen        = "L. major",
    target          = "host",

    organism_db     = "Homo.sapiens",
    organism_genome = "hg19",
    orgdb_key       = "ENSEMBL",
    biomart_dataset = "hsapiens_gene_ensembl",

    input_count_tables  = file.path(Sys.getenv("SCRATCH"), "lmajor-hsapiens",
                                   "counts", "hsapiens", "*.count"),

    samples             = read_csv(file.path(Sys.getenv('RESEARCH'), '2015',
                                             '11-coex-network-hsapiens-infected-with-lmajor',
                                             'settings', 'hsapiens_samples.csv')) %>%
                          filter(startsWith(Condition, 'infLM')),
    sample_id           = 'HPGL_ID',
    condition           = 'Condition',
    batch               = 'Batch',
    covariates          = c('Batch'),

    main_comparison       = c('infLM4', 'infLM72'),
    main_comparison_label = "Î”Expr (72 - 4 hrs)",

    verbose             = FALSE,
    include_tables      = TRUE,
    include_plots       = FALSE,
    debug               = FALSE,
    use_cache           = FALSE
)
```
